def bla(x):
    print(x)
    return x**2


import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

X = np.random.randint(0, 10, (100, 3))
X = pd.DataFrame(X)

pd.pivot_table(X, index=[0], columns=[2], values=[1], aggfunc=np.sum)
